nodes.text: The Zabian system was a star system located within the Phelleem sector in the Outer Rim region of the galaxy.

The amusement park Hologram Fun World was located in a helium gas cloud near the Zabian star system. After losing Cloud City to the Hutt crime lord Zorba Desilijic Tiure in a rigged sabacc game after the Battle of Endor, Lando Calrissian left Bespin and went there.
